verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) The earth <S%H776><s%> is the Lord's, and all <S%H4393><s%> it contains, <S%H4393><s%> The world, <S%H8398><s%> and those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in it.
For He has founded <S%H3245><s%> it upon the seas, <S%H3220><s%> And established <S%H3559><s%> it upon the rivers. <S%H5104><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> may ascend <S%H5927><s%> into the hill <S%H2022><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>? And who <S%H4310><s%> may stand <S%H6965><s%> in His holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>?

He who has clean <S%H9345><s%> hands <S%H3709><s%> and a pure <S%H1249><s%> heart, <S%H3824><s%> Who <S%H834><s%> has not lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his soul <S%H5315><s%> to falsehood, <S%H7723><s%> And has not sworn <S%H7650><s%> deceitfully. <S%H4820><s%>
He shall receive <S%H5375><s%> a blessing <S%H1293><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%> And righteousness <S%H6666><s%> from the God <S%H430><s%> of his salvation. <S%H3468><s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> is the generation <S%H1755><s%> of those who seek <S%H1875><s%> Him, Who seek <S%H1245><s%> Thy face <S%H6440><s%> â€“ [even] Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Lift <S%H5375><s%> up your heads, <S%H7218><s%> O gates, <S%H8179><s%> And be lifted <S%H5375><s%> up, O ancient <S%H5769><s%> doors, <S%H6607><s%> That the King <S%H4428><s%> of glory <S%H9202><s%> may come <S%H935><s%> in!

Who <S%H4310><s%> is the King <S%H4428><s%> of glory <S%H9202><s%>? The Lord <S%H3068><s%> strong <S%H5808><s%> and mighty, <S%H1368><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> in battle. <S%H4421><s%>

Lift <S%H5375><s%> up your heads, <S%H7218><s%> O gates, <S%H8179><s%> And lift <S%H5375><s%> [them] up, O ancient <S%H5769><s%> doors, <S%H6607><s%> That the King <S%H4428><s%> of glory <S%H9202><s%> may come <S%H935><s%> in!

Who <S%H4310><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> of glory <S%H9202><s%>? The Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> He is the King <S%H4428><s%> of glory. <S%H9202><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
